p.d: When he leaves the police academy, Antoine heads up to Paris to become a detective. Commander Caroline Vaudieu, back at work after having beaten her alcoholism, chooses him for her team. She quickly becomes attached to the young lieutenant, who is the same age as her disappeared son... Directed by: Xavier Beauvois (France, 2004) Cast: Nathalie Baye (Commander Vaudieu), Jalil Lespert (Antoine), Roschdy Zem (Solo), Antoine Chappey (Louis), Xavier Beauvois (Nicolas), Jacques Perrin (Clermont) Genre: crime drama Awards: CÃ©sar award for best actress (Nathalie Baye) in 2006. Parental guidance: TV-PG
